General.Name: Lotus KFM Bhd
General.Description: Lotus KFM Berhad engages in flour milling and trading in flour related products in Malaysia. It offers wheat flours; tapioca and corn starch, as well as pre-mix products. The company was formerly known as Kuantan Flour Mills Berhad and changed its name to Lotus KFM Berhad in November 2019. Lotus KFM Berhad was founded in 1984 and is based in Putrajaya, Malaysia.
